articles.description: What better way to celebrate National Burrito Day than checking out the most sought-after burrito spot in your state?
articles.content:
(NEXSTAR) – April 7 is more than just a Thursday – it’s National Burrito Day. Before you start searching for the best place to celebrate (by getting a burrito, of course), Google has you covered.

articles.author: Yang Jie
articles.title: Manufacturers Grind to a Halt in China as Covid Lockdowns Expand - The Wall Street Journal
articles.description: Manufacturers including suppliers to Apple and Tesla are struggling to keep some of their China operations going as extended and widening Covid-19 lockdowns choke off supplies and clog up truck routes and ports.
articles.content: Manufacturers are struggling to keep some of their China operations going as extended and widening Covid-19 lockdowns choke off supplies and clog up truck routes and ports, heaping more pressure on t… [+402 chars]
